location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 593 from John Pollard Willoughby, Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a report from the Resident indicating that Shaikh Sultan ben Suggur [Sulṭān bin Saqr] has abandoned his plans of attacking the Shahabeen tribe. It further instructs him to encourage the 'Chiefs of Arabia' to resist Egyptian encroachment into Oman.
